original: mang du thos pa'i rna ba can //
analyzed: mang du thos pa'i rna ba can //
translated: and the ears of much hearing.

original: dbyig gnyen sogs kyi zhal skyin bzhin //
analyzed: dbyig gnyen sogs kyi zhal skyin bzhin //
translated: Like the faces of Vasubandhu and so forth.

original: 'on kyang deng dus gangs can 'dir //
analyzed: 'on kyang deng dus gangs can 'dir //
translated: But in this Land of Snows today,

original: khyon pa'i rus spal rang gnas bzhin //üîΩblo chung rang gi blo nus kyis //
analyzed: khyon pa'i rus spal rang gnas bzhin // blo chung rang gi blo nus kyis //
translated: I am like a turtle in its own place.üîΩThose who are satisfied with their own limited intelligence

original: cher ngoms rnams kyis brnyas pa'i gnas //
analyzed: cher ngoms rnams kyis brnyas pa'i gnas //
translated: Are the ones who despise me.

original: skad gnyis smra ba'i gtsug gi nor bu shod ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi //
analyzed: skad gnyis smra ba'i gtsug gi nor bu shod ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi //
translated: The crest jewel of the speakers of the two languages, Shot√∂n Dorj√© Gyaltsen,

original: legs bshad lde mig mchog gis legs sbyar rin chen gter gyi kha phye nas //
analyzed: legs bshad lde mig mchog gis legs sbyar rin chen gter gyi kha phye nas //
translated: Opened the door to the treasure of the well-constructed,üîΩThis much is the source of the wealth of understanding the various scriptural traditions,

original: sna tshogs gzhung lugs legs par rtogs pa'i 'byor bar dbang byed 'di tsam zhig / dus 'dir dpal ldan blo gros brtan pa'i yid kyi ngal so'i gnas su gyur //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzhung lugs legs par rtogs pa'i 'byor bar dbang byed 'di tsam zhig / dus 'dir dpal ldan blo gros brtan pa'i yid kyi ngal so'i gnas su gyur //
translated: The resting place for the mind of the glorious Sthiramati in this time.

original: rang gi rtogs pa 'phel dang de 'dra don gnyer ba //
analyzed: rang gi rtogs pa 'phel dang de 'dra don gnyer ba //
translated: Those who increase their own understanding and who strive for such

original: blo ldan gzhan la phan phyir bsgyur bar rtsom pa na //
analyzed: blo ldan gzhan la phan phyir bsgyur bar rtsom pa na //
translated: Begin to translate for the benefit of other intelligent people.

original: gzhung lugs nags su rnams dag blo yis rol byed pa //
analyzed: gzhung lugs nags su rnams dag blo yis rol byed pa //
translated: Those who play with their minds in the forest of scriptural traditions

original: dpal ldan smra ba'i seng ges bskul ba rdzogs bar bsgrubs /
analyzed: dpal ldan smra ba'i seng ges bskul ba rdzogs bar bsgrubs /
translated: The request of the glorious Lion of Speech has been fulfilled.

original: deng sang bstan pa nyams dams pas //
analyzed: deng sang bstan pa nyams dams pas //
translated: These days, the teachings are in decline,üîΩand those who practice in this way

original: 'di lta'i tshul la mthun bsgrub dang // 'jug pa shin tu nyung mod kyi //
analyzed: 'di lta'i tshul la mthun bsgrub dang // 'jug pa shin tu nyung mod kyi //
translated: and engage in it are extremely few.

original: shes na mkhas pa'i go 'phang 'thob //üîΩ'di nam khas par bya 'dod cing //
analyzed: shes na mkhas pa'i go 'phang 'thob // 'di nam khas par bya 'dod cing //
translated: But if you understand it, you will attain the level of a scholar.üîΩIf you want to be known as a scholar,

original: gang zhag shes na mkhas 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang zhag shes na mkhas 'gyur ba //
translated: and if you want to be known as a scholar,

original: 'di dang 'di 'dra'i gzhung mi slob //
analyzed: 'di dang 'di 'dra'i gzhung mi slob //
translated: you should study texts like this.

original: de rnams blo ni bem po 'am ci //
analyzed: de rnams blo ni bem po 'am ci //
translated: Are their minds just dull?

original: 'phags blo ma thob blo gros skyon //
analyzed: 'phags blo ma thob blo gros skyon //
translated: The fault of the mind is not attaining the noble mind.

original: mnyan pa ma grub skal ba'i skyon //
analyzed: mnyan pa ma grub skal ba'i skyon //
translated: The fault of fortune is not accomplishing what is heard.

original: yang yang ma bltas brtson 'grus skyon //
analyzed: yang yang ma bltas brtson 'grus skyon //
translated: The fault of diligence is not looking again and again.

original: des skyon ldan na mkhas bzod mdzod //
analyzed: des skyon ldan na mkhas bzod mdzod //
translated: If there are faults due to that, please forgive the scholar.

original: 'dir 'bad dge bas 'gro ba kun //
analyzed: 'dir 'bad dge bas 'gro ba kun //
translated: By the virtue of striving in this, may all beingsüîΩunderstand the meaning of the scriptures

original: rang rang skad las gsung rab /
analyzed: rang rang skad las gsung rab /
translated: in their own languages,

original: don // brjod med de nyid rab rtogs nas //
analyzed: don // brjod med de nyid rab rtogs nas //
translated: and may they realize the inexpressible suchnessüîΩand become masters of speech.

original: ngag gi dbang phyug nyid gyur cig /'gro ba du ma la phan par gyur cig /
analyzed: ngag gi dbang phyug nyid gyur cig /'gro ba du ma la phan par gyur cig /
translated: May it be beneficial to many beings.
